column2: ITP009-10 - Electrical Fit-out of New SIT Pits
column8: ITP009-10 - Electrical Fit-out of New SIT Pits

column2: 1.0 Electrical Fit-out of New SIT Pits
Acceptance Criteria: Prior to entering pit, power to be isolated to the satisfaction of the Principal and other relevant authorities.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 010
• Primary and secondary cables installed, along with transformers and primary connector joints.
• Ensure sufficient distance maintained between transformers from different circuits.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 010
Acceptance Criteria: Connect and mount SITs to stand/trays and label primary/secondary cables.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 010
Acceptance Criteria: Energise circuits and test lights.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 010
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
